RelatedSentence: Mr Jatuporn , head of the red shirts ' umbrella organiastion the United Front for Democracy against Dictatorship ( UDD ) told Thai Rath TV that supporters rallying on Utthayan Road in western Bangkok should stay put , but not try to oppose troops sent into the rally area at 3 am Tuesday .
He said he was not surprised at the martial law declaration , after seeing signs that the army could step in to try to control the situation .
